title: Server Lag Times
body: Has anyone experienced lag during the times of 4pm-9pm? Eventually it gets better onwards after those times with some ping spikes though. Played in NA on those times with no issues, probably it's the servers.

replies.body: I'be been getting lag spikes to around 200 ping lately too. It makes it really hard to know when I can play ranked
Rank has been bad lately due to this issue.
Ping spikes happen at any time in the day. I don't know about others, but my time is usually from 9pm-11pm. Sometimes it depends on sever or your ISP either.
Do you sometimes get the "Attempting to Reconnect" and 2000 ping?
